name: Fetal Savant
description: A disturbing Tiny humanoid with exceptional Charisma and a chaotic nature. Its skin is pale and it constantly babbles, emitting an unsettling aura of madness.
memorable: The Fetal Savant can swap souls with humanoids, allowing for strategic chaos in encounters.
goals: To manipulate enemies and thrive on fear and psychological disruption.
relations: May be found with other chaotic evil creatures or entities interested in manipulation.
environment: Often encountered in dark, oppressive settings or places with abundant shadow.
strengths: Immunity to psychic damage and a powerful ability to incapacitate opponents with Maddening Babble.
weaknesses: Low physical attributes and hypersensitivity to sunlight, taking damage when exposed.
attacks: Uses Psychic Burst attacks that deal devastating psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Soul Exchange ability allows it to control other humanoids while paralyzed.
senses: Possesses darkvision, enabling it to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Skilled in perception with an average modifier that aids in spotting hidden creatures.
additional_information: Can create an Enchanted Cage for protection and mobility
Immunities to being charmed or frightened
Psychic damage dealt to attackers touching its cage
Constantly emits maddening babble to disorient enemies
test_queries: creature that swaps souls with others
tiny humanoid with maddening babble ability
chaotic evil creature that manipulates minds
